about_the_game:
Get a taste of the UNDYING soundtrack with this Original Soundtrack!
Featuring three 13 tracks from the game by Dan Poole, Angela Liu, Bing Bing and Adgio Hutchings!

Memories Of Home

A soulful song returns to its old place, and I weep with a broken heart for you.

Hold My Hand

Holding onto you tightly, I write this moment into memory
Holding onto you tightly, as if I can grasp onto this time.

Home Sweet Home

The place where I can be with you, safe from wind and rain.

Safety In Numbers

The crisis that comes from the sky can never stop the artificial conflicts...

Trip Of A Lifetime

With my lifetime, I'll take you on a journey.

Your Are Not Alone

Don't be afraid, keep me in your heart, I'll accompany you.

Harbouring Secrets

Hidden secret
Is it better to die than to reveal it?

Together Alone

The distortion and strangeness of the world is like taking a group photo at the edge of a cliff - the more people there are, the more terrifying it becomes.

Anling's Farewell With Harmonica (A version)

Life is a journey of farewells.

Anling's Farewell With Harmonica (B version)

The beauty of memories lies in having a home and a mother there.

Farewell By Anling

In youth, bidding farewell amidst fragrant grass and sky,
In old age, lamenting farewell as the sunset dwindles by.

Farewell By Young Anling

Today is full of worries,
Yesterday cannot be kept.

Farewell By Cody

Child, when you were singing, I criticized you for not having any emotions... now I regret it.

name: Undying - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 300 MB available space
